title: Report: New 15-inch MacBook coming in late 2023, might not be called ‘Air’
content:
Earlier this week, a new report from Display Supply Chain Consultants (DSCC) revealed that Apple has been working on a new MacBook Air with a 15-inch display to be introduced sometime next year. Now analyst Ming-Chi Kuo claims that this new MacBook will be released in late 2023, but it might not be called “Air.”

more…

The post Report: New 15-inch MacBook coming in late 2023, might not be called ‘Air’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo claims that Apple is working on new MacBook to be released in late 2023, but it might not be called "Air."
